caption.body: Arnaldo Pomodoro first trained as an architect and was also a jewelry designer prior to becoming a sculptor. “Cilindro Costruito” (Constructed Cylinder) is a sixteen-foot tall columnar form with an erratic vertical fissure, frozen in the process of eroding, that runs the length of the sculpture. The exposed area reveals a complex, multi-faceted interiority that contrasts with the highly polished, smooth surface.  See “Cilindro Costruito” by Arnaldo Pomodoro on display, in the pre-security connector between Terminal 2 and Terminal 3, right under SFO’s air traffic control tower. https://bit.ly/3CvSTrC
caption.excerpt: Arnaldo Pomodoro first trained as an architect and was also a jewelry designer prior to becoming a sculptor.
